about_the_game:
With the Forbidden Fantasy Supporter Pack, you can now customize the appearances of Arlian, Zhara, and Camilla with exclusive, sensual skins that add a unique touch to some scenes.

And there's more! You'll have exclusive access to the STL file of the Zhara statue, designed for 3D printing. That's right: Zhara is the first Forbidden Fantasy character to receive a collectible statue, and now she can be yours!

Content Highlights:

  • Support the developers: By purchasing this pack, you support our game studio to keep developing the game you love.

  • Exclusive Skins: Customize Arlian, Zhara, and Camilla with unique and captivating looks. By doing so, you will enhance your journey, create more of a connection with the story and make your adventure truly unique.

  • 3D printable Zhara statue: Access a detailed 3D model of Zhara, ready for printing. Display her as an impressive piece in your real-world collection.

Thank you for helping us make Forbidden Fantasy even better!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

And there's more! You'll have exclusive access to the STL file of the Zhara statue, designed for 3D printing. That's right: Zhara is the first Forbidden Fantasy character to receive a collectible statue, and now she can be yours!

name: Forbidden Fantasy - Supporter Pack
short_description: With the Forbidden Fantasy Supporter Pack, you can now customize the appearances of Arlian, Zhara, and Camilla with exclusive, sensual skins that add a unique touch to some scenes. You'll also get the STL file of the Zhara statue, designed for 3D printing.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
